welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rock Island, the charming city known for its scenic riverfront and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quad-City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves American Airlines and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves Delta Air Lines and Allegiant Air flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Davenport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Davenport Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Clinton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
